Issue.creator: jjjjibm
Issue.summary: node-SDK npm WARN notsup Not compatible with your operating system or architecture: fsevents@1.0.15
Issue.description: virtualbox->vagrant->Ubuntu Since I'm using Ubuntu, we shouldn't be seeing these warnings. How to recreate: 1.vagrant up 2.vagrant ssh 3.cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/hyperledger 4.git clone http://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/fabric-sdk-node 5.cd fabric-sdk-node 6.npm install >
